issue.title: [#2933] Move HonoConnection related classes
issue.body:
Moved HonoConnection and its implementation to amqp-connection module.
Having an additional module apart from amqp-common is necessary in order
to not introduce cyclic dependencies between modules.

This is the first PR in a series of PRs to implement #2933

issue.title: [#2933] Move AMQP specific error conversion methods
issue.body:
2nd step of #2933

Moved AMQP specific error conversion methods of StatusCodeMapper to
separate class in amqp-connection module in order to remove dependencies
to Proton-J.

issue.title: [#2933] Move ConnectionFactory related classes
issue.body:
3rd step of #2933

Moved ConnectionFactory and its implementation to amqp-connection
module. This is also a first step in removing the Proton-J dependencies from
the core module.

issue.title: [#2933] Move ServiceInvocationException hierarchy
issue.body:
Moved exceptions to client-common module.

Fixes #2933
